ing: 1/4 teaspoon ground cinnamon, or to taste
1/4 teaspoon ground cardamom, or to taste
des: "A quick sweet dressing for any mixture of fruit salad. Especially good in summer for a no cook dinner. Serve over cut up and mixed fruit of your choice, either fresh or canned."
ins: Whisk the sour cream, sweetened condensed milk, vanilla, almond extract, cinnamon, and cardamom together in a mixing bowl. Refrigerate the dressing until ready to serve.
